h2_title: How to Complete the Old Man's Questline
content: Upgrade your Old Gourd to the Medicine Buddha Gourd. When you've done this, speak to him and then examine the flame in the center of the room. Your Gourd will absorb the spirit and become the Supreme Gourd. If the trophy for this side quest doesn't pop, for you, make sure you visit each of the Chapters before and revisit his locations to hear all of his dialogue.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'How to Complete the Old Man's Questline'.
The content is as follows:
Upgrade your Old Gourd to the Medicine Buddha Gourd. When you've done this, speak to him and then examine the flame in the center of the room. Your Gourd will absorb the spirit and become the Supreme Gourd. If the trophy for this side quest doesn't pop, for you, make sure you visit each of the Chapters before and revisit his locations to hear all of his dialogue.
